channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- InterScan Web Security Virtual Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trend Micro -- InterScan Web Security Virtual Appliance

item.title: CVE-2019-9490|2024-08-04T21:54:44.101Z -- trend%20micro -- interscan%20web%20security%20virtual%20appliance
item.description: A vulnerability in Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Virtual Appliance version 6.5 SP2 could allow an non-authorized user to disclose administrative credentials. An attacker must be an authenticated user in order to exploit the vulnerability.
